explains: v. 消失，不见；失踪，丢失；不复存在，灭绝

sentences.en: They watched the bus disappear into the distance.
sentences.cn: 他们注视着公共汽车消失在远方。

sentences.en: It was uncharacteristic of her father to disappear like this.
sentences.cn: 就这样消失不是她父亲的风格。

sentences.en: The problems of traffic congestion will not disappear in a hurry.
sentences.cn: 交通堵塞问题不会很快消失。
